PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-00072023-01-11FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of ERNEST DANIELS of West Kelowna, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2023, in the place of Monique Mercier, who has resigned.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of ERNEST DANIELS of West Kelowna, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2023, in the place of Monique Mercier, who has resigned.
